title: Foundations of Ontology-Based Instructional Design Knowledge Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic educational theory and experience with mobile learning platforms
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity to design large-scale language education in smartphone-based constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Systematically structure language education objectives using an ontology-based instructional design framework
Design flexible instructional models by applying domain patterns
Explain methods for mapping instructional materials optimized for mobile environments to ontology attributes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
